title: Guy spends 45 minutes shoveling 8 inches of snow from cars, neighbor steals his parking space: 'I must have poured about 10 gallons of water on his car... it sat like that overnight'
description: With 8 inches of snow covering the ground, one guy got to work shoveling. It's not the most fun job in the world, but someone's got to do it! For most people, shovelling snow is one of those reasons they dread the sight of any snowfall. While kids get to frolic around in the snow and build snow forts, the adults are stuck sweeping the snow from pathways and using those ice scrapers to de-ice the windshields. This person had not only one car to save from the 8 inches of snow, but two! They report that it took them roughly 45 minutes in freezing cold temperatures to get the two cars shoveled out. That explains their reaction when they realized their neighbor did them wrong! This neighbor had the audacity to steal that freshly-shoveled spot with their own car. That's just asking for trouble! Next, read about the employees who are driving their coworkers crazy with their incompetence, like one woman who is "manually deleting… 180,000 emails."
author: Remy Millisky
excerpt: Guy spends 45 minutes shoveling 8 inches of snow from cars, neighbor steals his parking space: 'I must have poured about 10 gallons of water on his car... it sat like that overnight' - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.

html:
With 8 inches of snow covering the ground, one guy got to work shoveling. It's not the most fun job in the world, but someone's got to do it! 

For most people, shovelling snow is one of those reasons they dread the sight of any snowfall. While kids get to frolic around in the snow and build snow forts, the adults are stuck sweeping the snow from pathways and using those ice scrapers to de-ice the windshields. 

This person had not only one car to save from the 8 inches of snow, but two! They report that it took them roughly 45 minutes in freezing cold temperatures to get the two cars shoveled out. That explains their reaction when they realized their neighbor did them wrong! This neighbor had the audacity to steal that freshly-shoveled spot with their own car. That's just asking for trouble! 

Next, read about the employees who are driving their coworkers crazy with their incompetence, like one woman who is "manually deleting… 180,000 emails."
